scripts.collect: npm run build && npm run mkdirs && npm run copy-files && npm run replace-all && npm run load-static
scripts.replace-all: npm run perform-replace ../backend/templates/base.html $(ls ../backend/staticfiles/js/*.js | xargs -n 1 basename | tr '\n' ' ')
scripts.perform-replace: python -c "import sys;from functools import reduce;p=sys.argv[1];data=reduce(lambda x,y: x.replace('/static/js/'+y,'{% static \'js/'+y+'\' %}'),sys.argv[2:],open(p).read());open(p,'w').write(data)"
scripts.load-static: python -c "d='{% load static %}';f='../backend/templates/base.html';r=open(f).read();open(f, 'w').write(d+r) if r.find(d) == -1 else None"
